articles.description: Matthew Garrison codes, composes, performs and produces as he pushes the boundaries of music.
articles.content:
The jazz bass player Matthew Garrison doesnt like to slow down. Im always thinking, doing, he said.
As a performer, he has toured with Herbie Hancock and has upcoming shows with the pianist Jason Mo… [+563 chars]
